offices.title: Member of the U.S. House of Representative from Minnesota's 3rd district
Member of the Minnesota House of Representatives from the 42B district

statements.quote: Aug 10: World's Highest Corporate Tax Rate. Makes it harder to compete globally & create good-paying jobs back home [#31ReasonsforTaxReform](https://twitter.com/hashtag/31ReasonsforTaxReform?src=hash)
